name: A Seated Man
description: A Seated Man; Bernardino Poccetti (Barbatelli) (Italian, 1548 - 1612); about 1600 - 1610; Red chalk and light white heightening.; 39.4 x 24.8 cm (15 1/2 x 9 3/4 in.); 85.GB.291; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: A Seated Man
medium: Red chalk and light white heightening.
